Show password There are prestart settings of Schulte tables training should be improved Here is the news list coming soon.\n Brief info: https://handwiki.org/wiki/Schulte_table Notifications should be here Here the dashboard is developing Achievements The Dot Double Dot Circles Red/Blue Circles R/B Lined Circles R/B Crossed Piramidot Necker\'s cube Necker\'s Cube Doubled Necker\'s Ball Necker\'s Cylinder Dancing Girl Dancing Cat There are very symple thereforee hard exercicises which are require your stable attention Twin mode* For the asterisk-marked exercises content will run as a parallel stereo image Penrose\'s Triangle s.Deviation: Average: Turns missed Schulte+ Basics Dummy Button DUMMY\nCONTENT Khao Manee User related options User About the application About Contact to developer Contact Agree to share non-personal data App shows mistakes Options SUM Your exercise results are NOT seeable, so you also can NOT see the other users\' results Your exercise results are SEEABLE on the server dashboard, though you also can SEE the other users\' results ST ON ST OFF Sound response Vibration response Help Send feedback Report technical issues or suggest new features Name Name or nickname what\'s visible to other users e-mail Identifier that allows restoring data (not visible to other users) This application dedicated to main idea of human development. It implements well-known trainee tool Tables of dr.Schulte who developed them to study human\'s attention and to help people with mental diseases improve their abilities.\n Besides several variants of Schulte Tables, we put in the app some psychonetics-tested treasures which are necessary to everyone who pursuits: Consciousness, Self-Development and Open-Mind approach to the Universe. Click here -> Our website You can change your level within the reached span "Your current level out of " The level you can choose for rating trainings Stars Level Your maximum reached level is Hours Earned number of \'minutes\' converted to hours of practice There are core exercises based upon Schulte methods Primary flow The exercise wants you to collect growing sequence Field width or x-size Field height or y-size Ratings Your settings gets comparable to other members\' settings. Your scores might be written to the Wall of Fame. This settings are for variety of personal training. Your scores are saved into your Achievements table. Air and Fire (7х7)> Two sequences are waiting: Blue grows from 1 and Red wanes from 24 Four Seasons (10х10) For sequences: Up, Down, Convergent, Divergent... That might make you mad for starters Hints These fancy glows, digital reminders and timing are for rookie levels only. Cell\'s symbol type Mishmash! Well, try to find them all totally unique Shaken, not stirred! Can not get data User must be logged in \@att.org User data renewed I agree: Username has been successfully updated for new records Your profile email will change with next log in Conditions user_agreement-en.html http://attplus.in/schulte/en/ex_description/ The Launch Button After you chose and setup an exercise this button can Launch:\n• The Exercise by Tap\n• Web advices for it by Long Tap Basics Settings for basics Exercises Schulte Settings for Exercises on the Schulte area Dashboard Exercises aims and efficiency analysis News Attention Schulte Plus and friends news feed Profile and App Settings Manage your league and privacy and check application details Show intro Base Settings You can chose here:\n• The Exercise Type by Checkbox\n• Use or not Hints\n• And use Launch Long Tap for Web advices Schulte Settings You can chose here:\n• The Exercise Type by Checkbox\n• Use or not Hints\n• And many other (use Launch Long Tap for Web advices) Base Space Base is simple as that\n• Left [✓] Event button\n• Right [◁] Finish button\n• The Counter and Timer between them if the Hints "On"\n(use Launch Long Tap for Web advices) Schulte Space Just tap the Cells in Sequence\nJust long tap if you\'ve forgotten the Sequence\n• Exercise finishes at the end of the Sequence\n• Your device [◁] Back button interrupts the Exercise\n• The Counters and Timer at the top if the Hints "On"\n(using Launch Long Tap for Web advices is HIGHLY recommended) Dashboard This space shows you history data.\n• Some data trimmed (such as long Exercise Note string) and showed by a Long Tap\n• Also Long Tap on the Dashboard copies its content to buffer you can collect data for more powerful analysis on desktop. Dashboard Spinner Select data about Achievements or Exercise Results by its Type Dashboard Source Select local or world-wide data\n• The local dashboard is minimalistic\n• The server data Dashboards are kept developing\n(the server data does not show your private Notes to others) Home Space (under construction) Here you get informed of:\n• Attention Schulte Plus news\n• Outstanding Training Records\n• Other helpful Sources for Meditation and Consciousness Techniques Attention Confirm account deletion.
We are glad that you have achieved the ability to consciously make strong-willed decisions that positively influence the prospects of your life and its environment.
In this moment, here and now, you will leave your XXX psycoins with a light heart and renounce your personal history in XX days.
We look forward to your successful application of our techniques in practice and will not stop developing new exercises that will be waiting if you decide to return.
We are sure you will not be embarrassed that you will have to start from scratch.
And yet, we feel obliged to ask again:
-- Do you want to stay? Your app version is %1$d which is deprecated. We recommend you to upgrade your app to version %2$d. The current app shuts down. n\See you updated! Your app version is %1$d which goes deprecated soon. We recommend you to upgrade your app to version %2$d otherwise you won\'t be able to run the app soon.
